item.description:
Are you aspiring to work as a makeup artist, fashion stylist, photo stylist, nail artist, hair stylist or prop stylist?

Are you currently working in the industry but want to bulid your book and expand your opportunities?

This is a meeting you don't want to miss.

At this meeting you will recieve tips to help you grow your connections and increase your visibility in the industry. Information presented include: kit focus, digital vs traditional portfolio, building your data base and more.

Each attendee will be presented with a resouce guide to help you find build your book, find jobs, select locations, book models, get your website running and more.

We will end the meeting with an inital plan for our next photo event: THE BLUE SEA (details to follow)

RSVP today.

The meeting location is easy to get to by car or by public transportation. There is street parking and garage parking available.

or take the train to : Auditorium, Prudential Center, Copley or Bay Back station. Its less than a 5 minute walk to our location from any of these stops.
item.how_to_find_us: Prudential Center Food Court near Paradise Bakery

group.name: Boston Beauty, Fashion and Photo Stylist

item.name: The Working Stylist
